title: Trigun: Multiple Bullets
original_name: トライガン・マルチプルバレッツ
sinopse:
A Trigun anthology.

1-2. Gekijouban Trigun Badlands Rumble: Bangaihen 3. Trigun: The Lost Plant 4. Suna no Wakusei no Tami (Denizens of the Sand Planet) 5. Les Enfants 6. Eisei Mil Mer TV (Mil/Mer TV) 7. Raijin: Risin (Trigun: Rising) 8. Cutting is Fighting
